attributes.action: VPNs and Proxies Should Not be Banned by Netflix
attributes.additional_details:
It’s definitely possible for Netflix users to have second thoughts on whether to prolong their subscription or not. With limited access, the drive to search for another provider is increasing. 

Proxies and VPNs should be allowed not only for the sake of accessing content, but also for providing a more secure Internet browsing experience for everyone, which the VPN services at https://vpnoverview.com/ offer.
attributes.background:
To make sure that all paying subscribers of Netflix get equal access to all Netflix content.

Netflix offers plentiful options to anyone looking for entertainment. Movie after movie is being added to the growing number of genres to choose from and that’s one of the reasons people love Netflix.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for Netflix.
